==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|さん|ない|おん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{m|ja|三内|tr=sannai}} and {{m|ja|音|tr=on||sound}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[saɴnai]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さんないおん|kyu=三內音}}

# {{lb|ja|phonetics}} in [[w:Siddhaṃ script|Sanskrit]] phonology, a consonant produced using one of the three [[w:Place of articulation|places of articulation]]: [[w:Dorsal consonant|dorsal]] (/k, g, ŋ/), [[w:Coronal consonant|coronal]] (/t, d, n/), or [[w:Labial consonant|labial]] (/p, b, m/)
